prompt: Create a policy against concave decisions (low upside, high uncertain downside) for a company. For example, a violation of this policy would be getting drunk with prospective customers (little upside, but high uncertain downside). Research the related ideas of Taleb and other related authors and thinkers. Reduce it down to a simple set of guidelines for team members.
title: Company Policy: Avoiding Concave Decisions (Low-Upside, High-Downside Risks)
